PluginData.Author: dude
PluginData.Description: Removes the check for obstructions when using the 3rd person view while seated in a ship. This allows you to rotate the camera around freely without it being forced to zoom in or out. Great for tunnel-boring mining ships! **New** Now you can offset the position that the camera rotates around to anywhere inside of your ships bounding box! ** Hold Ctrl+Shift and use the block rotation keys to move the rotation point.
